column4: Heh. I had everything running beautifully the other day. Then things just decided not to work. First I couldn't Boot into Windows, or my Recovery Partition, then Ubuntu decided not to want to boot, so I decided to reinstall Ubuntu. Now I get GRUB error 18 at Stage 1.5, and can only boot from the Live CD
- sounds like an enchanting fairy tail involving a wicked witch and bunk installation media
I checked the Ubuntu  Install CD and the built in thing to check if it is corrupt said it is just fine.
